intro: Textarea components are used for collecting large amounts of textual data.

grow.heading: Auto grow
grow.intro: When using the auto-grow prop, textarea’s will automatically increase in size when the contained text exceeds its size.

background.heading: Background color
background.intro: The background-color and color props give you more control over styling v-textarea's.

autocomplete.heading: Browser autocomplete
autocomplete.intro: The autocomplete prop gives you the option to enable the browser to predict user input.

clearable.heading: Clearable
clearable.intro: You can clear the text from a v-textarea by using the clearable prop, and customize the icon used with the clearable-icon prop.

counter.heading: Counter
counter.intro: The counter prop informs the user of a character limit for the v-textarea.

icons.heading: Icons
icons.intro: The append-icon and prepend-icon props help add context to v-textarea.

noresize.heading: No resize
noresize.intro: v-textarea's have the option to remain the same size regardless of their content’s size, using the no-resize prop.

rows.heading: Rows
rows.intro: The rows prop allows you to define how many rows the textarea has, when combined with the row-height prop you can further customize your rows by defining their height.

signup.heading: Signup form
signup.intro: Utilizing alternative input styles, you can create amazing interfaces that are easy to build and easy to use.
